queries: select r.partition_date as periodo, length(CONCAT(E0627_FEOPERAC, E0627_S1EMP, E0627_CONTRA1, E0627_FEC_MES, E0627_CTA_CONT, E0627_AGRCTACB, E0627_IMPORTH, E0627_IDCTACEN, E0621_FECULTMO, E0627_CENTCTBL, E0627_ENTCGBAL, rpad(trim(E0627_CTACGBAL),40, ' '))) as longitud, CONCAT(E0627_FEOPERAC, E0627_S1EMP, E0627_CONTRA1, E0627_FEC_MES, E0627_CTA_CONT, E0627_AGRCTACB, E0627_IMPORTH, E0627_IDCTACEN, E0621_FECULTMO, E0627_CENTCTBL, E0627_ENTCGBAL, rpad(trim(E0627_CTACGBAL),40, ' ')) as detalle, from_unixtime(unix_timestamp()) as op_timestamp, d.tabla as tabla from bi_corp_bdr.jm_expos_no_con r left join bi_corp_bdr.tablas_info d on d.tabla = 'JM_EXPOS_NO_CON' where partition_date = '$month_partition_bdr' and length(CONCAT(E0627_FEOPERAC, E0627_S1EMP, E0627_CONTRA1, E0627_FEC_MES, E0627_CTA_CONT, E0627_AGRCTACB, E0627_IMPORTH, E0627_IDCTACEN, E0621_FECULTMO, E0627_CENTCTBL, E0627_ENTCGBAL, rpad(trim(E0627_CTACGBAL),40, ' '))) != cast(d.longitud as int)
